mapper.select: SELECT sa.id as sa_id, sa.*, sv.id as sv_id, sv.*, if(sav.sku_id,1,0) AS isChecked, sav.sku_id FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sv ON sa.spu_id = sv.spu_id AND sa.base_sale_attr_id = sv.base_sale_attr_id AND sv.spu_id = #{spuId} LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value sav ON sav.sale_attr_value_id = sv.id AND sav.sku_id = #{skuId} ORDER BY sa.base_sale_attr_id,sv.id
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( sale_attr_value_id ORDER BY sale_attr_value_id SEPARATOR '|' ) AS values_Ids, sku_id FROM sku_sale_attr_value sav WHERE sav.spu_id = #{spuId} GROUP BY sku_id

SELECT bav.attr_id as attrId, bai.attr_name as attrName, bav.value_name as attrValue FROM sku_sale_attr_value AS sav, base_attr_info AS bai, base_attr_value AS bav WHERE bai.id = bav.attr_id AND sav.sale_attr_value_id = bav.id AND sav.sku_id =#{skuInfoId}
